songs.album: Stereo: A Hip Hop Tribute To Classic Rock
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I want you
I want you so bad
I want you
I want you so bad, it's driving me mad
It's driving me mad
I want you
I want you so bad
I want you
I want you so bad, it's driving me mad
It's driving me...

She's so...

[Chorus: Yelawolf]
Just give me a reason to quit baby
A reason to give all my money
I'm in it for life without you, my love
My pain is only brief
It's only a moment of time before a dime bag reaches my pipeline
Baby, my love
My love

[Verse 1: Yelawolf]
One more take, one more spin
One more jam with you my friend
Success is within reach, what's the peep
My bud [?] heavy with the green leaf
I need beef to balance my diet
Ground, brown, come and try it
Don't hide from it, the spoon is filled up
Flame in motion, hit the reef, soar...
Where's my package my doctor prescribed?
It's not a habit, it's how I survive
I don't have a reason, no logic to my demise
But I'm a fiend, [?] I wanna get high
Tie that baby
All around the world
Come and fall apart
Before they pull the plug

[Chorus: Yelawolf]
Just give me a reason to quit baby
A reason to give all my money
I'm in it for life without you, my love
My pain is only brief
It's only a moment of time before a dime bag reaches my pipeline
Baby, my love

[Verse 2: Yelawolf]
Beautiful love, unimaginable lust
Come sit with my thoughts so obvious
My face can't hide what I'm feelin'
My feet on my floor, my [?] to the ceiling
What's the use? What's the source? What's the meanin'?
I can never know, I can never feel, my brain is peelin'...
My spirit is extractin', my reaction is not plastic
It's magic, it's havoc, combine to make what I imagine
Infected like a Komodo dragon
One bite from the teeth is a [?]
Tenderize my brain cells
Welcome to my hell
All around the world
Come and fall apart
Before they pull the plug

[Chorus: Yelawolf]
Just give me a reason to quit baby
A reason to give all my money
I'm in it for life without you, my love
My pain is only brief
It's only a moment of time before a dime bag reaches my pipeline
Baby, my love
songs.title: Heroine
